main.title: Components
main.subtitle: Components are used to store and organize reusable fields.
main.content:
Overview

Fieldsets are almost functionally equivalent to Templates, except that they exist for you to be able to create reusable modules.

While Templates attach directly to content like collections, Components are not directly attached to anything.

Fieldsets contain fields, just like Templates, but the benefit of using a Component is that you can import their fields (or the whole thing) into other Templates.
